attributes.action: Call in approval of Green Belt build Keresley Coventry
attributes.additional_details:
The Secretary of State should call in the approval of Coventry City Council to allow the building of an 800 house estate on Green Belt land.
An inquiry should examine the claim of the 'very special circumstances' required to build on the Green Belt.
We assert that the circumstances are insufficient to outweigh the harm likely to be caused to the Green Belt.
